keywords.value: State Administration of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television (China)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.print_headline: China Cracks Down on Online Television
headline.main: China Cracks Down on Online Television

snippet: Officials from the top broadcast regulator have said that programs will soon be subject to the same censorship as regular TV shows, according to a report in The Beijing Times.
abstract: Officials from the top broadcast regulator have said that programs will soon be subject to the same censorship as regular TV shows, according to a report in The Beijing Times.
